content: From here, things can get pretty varied and more open than the paths were in Chapter 1. To the right of the sealed door is a bridge leading to the Fright Valley (plus a Ginsengling you can beat up to harvest its plants). To the left lies the Valley of Despair, and beyond it the Crouching Tiger Temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair'.
The content is as follows:
From here, things can get pretty varied and more open than the paths were in Chapter 1. To the right of the sealed door is a bridge leading to the Fright Valley (plus a Ginsengling you can beat up to harvest its plants). To the left lies the Valley of Despair, and beyond it the Crouching Tiger Temple.
